TaBoard is a productivity tool to organise your browser, save your time and clear your mind üßòüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Have you ever worked on a project and felt swamped by the 100 tabs you opened in your browser? 

That happens to us all the time. ü§Ø
We start to work on a project, start the first search on google, open a link and then another one and then another one. And soon we're faced with 20+ small tabs sticking to each other. It‚Äôs a real nightmare to find the tab you need. 

Most of the time we end up going back on google and typing the exact same key words that we typed before or having to go through the whole browser history.

That‚Äôs why we developed TaBoard. 

Taboard is a chrome extension that can not only save one tab but can also save all the tabs open in your browser in one click. In one click you can save all your tabs, close your browser and find all those tabs back the next morning. TaBoard enables you to have access to a webapp to organize your tabs in folders. But also, most of the time, we work with other people. With TaBoard, you can share your folder with all the relevant links to someone else and easily collaborate on a project.

TaBoard enables you organise your workspace, save your time and clear your mind!
